attributes.title: 🧚‍♂️App isn’t efficient at all🧚‍♂️
attributes.review: Literally the worst app. Whenever I click on stuff it just brings up racist remarks and non-environmentally friendly things🥺

attributes.title: terrible app🤢🤮
attributes.review: This app a by far the worst app I have ever seen. This app supports a person who is racist and sexist and has not helped our country grow, but rather make it look stupid- Gen Z

attributes.title: Horrible app 😔
attributes.review: I got this app and was very excited to see what our wonderful Cheeto man’s campaign but I was very disappointed with the app. A lot of bugs and trolls. Please do not download it

attributes.title: Waste of time
attributes.review: I had super high hopes for this app but it left me very disappointed. 0/10. Wouldn’t recommend to anyone, don’t waste your time.

attributes.title: This app is garbage
attributes.review: After I downloaded this app all my Cheetos in my house disappeared! I think that’s what trump is using to change his skin tone. Not happy 😡😡😡😡😡😡😡 I want my precious 2 mins back!

attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: Would not recommend, the app runs slow, has grammatical errors, and has a terrible design. 3 things it shares in common with the 2020 republican candidate himself

attributes.title: Just a bad app
attributes.review: The got the app to see what the trump administration had planned and to gain knowledge on the campaign but the app lacked in all those categories!most of the app is just spam and his minimal purpose. Terrible app

attributes.title: Bummer
attributes.review: I was really looking forward to keeping up with all of Trumps campaign info but then I opened the app and it crashed... very disappointed :((((((((( big sad

attributes.title: Doesn’t work??
attributes.review: I downloaded this to get access to Trump’s policies but they all ended up being extremely fascist :/ very confusing

attributes.title: Does nothing but crash!
attributes.review: This app is as stupid as the President. All it does is crash and kick me out. Can’t even read a full page!
